skillTree.name: Warhorse
skillTree.description: A great charger from the Imperial stables is the only worthy steed for the Prince of Altdorf.

skillTree.name: Barded Warhorse
skillTree.description: A general's horse can be their most trusted and daring companion. Just don't name him 'Daisy'.

skillTree.name: Imperial Pegasus
skillTree.description: The Emperor has oft ridden a majestic Imperial pegasus in battle.

skillTree.name: Deathclaw
skillTree.description: The bond between Franz and Deathclaw - the mightiest of Imperial Griffons - is legendary.

skillTree.name: Leader of Men
skillTree.description: Franz is a sterling leader beloved by many, who can inspire not just those close, but all men.

effects.description:
Recruitment cost: -10% for infantry units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Sigmar’s Ward
skillTree.description: The relentless drive and fury of the Hammer, harnessed for the protection of this ward’s bearer.

skillTree.name: Best of the Empire
skillTree.description: "If we die, we will die wielding our swords, for there is no better death for a warrior."

effects.description:
[HIDDEN - do not translate] Used to increase lord rank when replacing a lord (target the effect at forces factionwide) - use in conjunction with a shown effect that targets provinces factionwide
	(all armies)

Leadership: +5 for Spearmen, Swordsmen, Free Company Militia and Halberdiers units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Imperial Special Forces
skillTree.description: Karl Franz has been hailed as an innovative tactician and a valiant general. Only the bravest and best among the Reiksguard may fight at his side.

effects.description:
Bonus vs Large: +10 for Reiksguard units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +10 for Reiksguard units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: The Emperor's Men
skillTree.description: Followers of the Emperor are inspired by his presence to attain levels of excellence in swordsmanship and personal loyalty they never thought possible.

effects.description:
Leadership: +10 for Greatswords and Wolf-Kin units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +20 for Greatswords and Wolf-Kin units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Heroic Knightly Band
skillTree.description: "We will sit at Sigmar's banquet like the heroes of old and our names will be remembered in our people's songs until the end of time!"

effects.description:
Hero recruit rank: +4 for Empire Captains
	(all provinces)

skillTree.name: Majestic Enforcer
skillTree.description: Thanks to Karl Franz's tireless efforts on behalf of his people, the Empire has flourished during his reign as never before.

skillTree.name: An Emperor's Journey
skillTree.description: Although Karl Franz walks a path many have trodden before, few - if any - have done so with such perfection and grace.

effects.description:
Leadership: +5 for Lords and embedded Heroes
	(all characters)

Weapon strength: +10% for Lords and embedded Heroes
	(all characters)

skillTree.name: Emperor
skillTree.description: For Ghal Maraz; for the Empire; for Franz!

skillTree.name: Warrior
skillTree.description: Every man fights. You can bark orders while swinging a warhammer or turning aside a blow with your shield.

skillTree.name: Imperial Discipline
skillTree.description: Led by veterans of countless battles, trained for thousands of hours, the soldiers of the Empire are ready for any foe.

skillTree.name: Flourishing Nation
skillTree.description: Under Franz’ rule, the Empire has reached new heights of prosperity.

effects.description:
Attrition: -10% when under siege
	(all armies factionwide)

skillTree.name: Greatest Statesman
skillTree.description: The old alliance must be restored. The nations of man and dwarf will stand against evil and triumph.

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

skillTree.name: Full Plate Armour
skillTree.description: Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.

skillTree.name: Scarred Veteran
skillTree.description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

skillTree.name: Deadly Blade
skillTree.description: A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Blade Master
skillTree.description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.name: Blade Shield
skillTree.description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

skillTree.name: Deadly Onslaught
skillTree.description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

skillTree.name: Military Heritage - Artillery Battery
skillTree.description: Fire support is critical to the Empire’s war efforts. Generals familiar with every facet of Imperial artillery know how to get the most out of their crews.

effects.description:
Reload time reduction: +3% for artillery units
	(Lord's army)

Recruit rank: +1 for artillery units
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +7% for artillery units
	(Lord's army)

Recruit rank: +2 for artillery units
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +15% for artillery units
	(Lord's army)

Recruit rank: +3 for artillery units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Military Heritage - The Watch
skillTree.description: A swift force can find itself in the right place at the right time.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -5% for Pistoliers and Outriders units
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +5% for Pistoliers and Outriders units
	(Lord's army)

Upkeep: -10% for Pistoliers and Outriders units
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +10% for Pistoliers and Outriders units
	(Lord's army)

Upkeep: -20% for Pistoliers and Outriders units
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +20% for Pistoliers and Outriders units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Military Heritage - The Vanguard
skillTree.description: The brave soldiers of the Empire who fight on the frontlines are led by an equally brave General. They will fight together, and often die together.

effects.description:
Missile resistance: 2% for infantry units
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -5% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +2% for missile infantry units
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 8% for infantry units
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +8% for missile infantry units
	(Lord's army)

Upkeep: -10% for Swordmen, Pikemen, Spearmen, Halberdiers, Archers, Huntsmen, Free Company Militia, Crossbowmen and Handgunners units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Military Heritage - Knightly Orders
skillTree.description: Obviously the most crucial and powerful branch of the Imperial military, the knights arrive to rescue their comrades from certain defeat with powerful charges and unmatched martial prowess. Just don’t compare them to Bretonnian knights; they don’t like that.

effects.description:
Leadership: +1 when in foreign territory
	(Lord's army)

Recruitment cost: -5% for cavalry units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +3% for Empire Knights and Order Knights units
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +2 when in foreign territory
	(Lord's army)

Recruitment cost: -10% for cavalry units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +7% for Empire Knights and Order Knights units
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +4 when in foreign territory
	(Lord's army)

Recruitment cost: -20% for cavalry units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +15% for Empire Knights and Order Knights units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Inspiring Presence
skillTree.description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

skillTree.name: Emperor's Finest
skillTree.description: “We march to war for our Emperor, and Sigmar, our saviour and lord.”

effects.description:
Melee defence: +2 for Spearmen, Swordsmen, Flagellants, Sigmarite Disciples and Halberdiers units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Spearmen, Swordsmen, Flagellants, Halberdiers and Free Company units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +4 for Spearmen, Swordsmen, Flagellants, Sigmarite Disciples and Halberdiers units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Spearmen, Swordsmen, Flagellants, Halberdiers and Free Company units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for Spearmen, Swordsmen, Flagellants, Sigmarite Disciples and Halberdiers units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Speed of Horse
skillTree.description: These steeds are bred for speed and war, but foremost it is their gallop which marks them out.

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +5 for Empire Knights and Order Knights units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +10 for Empire Knights and Order Knights units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +6 for Empire Knights and Order Knights units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +20 for Empire Knights and Order Knights units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +12 for Empire Knights and Order Knights units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Pistolkorps
skillTree.description: This Lord expects his men to practice the disciplines of the Pistolkorps, and all be expert marksmen.

effects.description:
Missile strength: +3% for Free Company Militia, Crossbowmen, Huntsmen, Archers, Handgunners, Pistoliers and Outriders units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +10% for Free Company Militia, Crossbowmen, Huntsmen, Archers, Handgunners, Pistoliers and Outriders missile units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +5% for Free Company Militia, Crossbowmen, Huntsmen, Archers, Handgunners, Pistoliers and Outriders units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +20% for Free Company Militia, Crossbowmen, Huntsmen, Archers, Handgunners, Pistoliers and Outriders missile units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +10% for Free Company Militia, Crossbowmen, Huntsmen, Archers, Handgunners, Pistoliers and Outriders units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Honest Steel
skillTree.description: Honest Empire-forged steel is all a state trooper could ask when confronting the myriad foes in battle.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +3% for Greatswords, Wolf-Kin and Demigryph Knights
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +5% for Greatswords, Wolf-Kin and Demigryph Knights
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +6 for Greatswords, Wolf-Kin and Demigryph Knights
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +10% for Greatswords, Wolf-Kin and Demigryph Knights
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +12 for Greatswords, Wolf-Kin and Demigryph Knights
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Mighty Forge
skillTree.description: Patrons of great forges and smiths expect, and are rewarded with, tougher and more enduring war machines.

effects.description:
Ward save: 2% for War Wagon, Steam Tank and Luminark of Hysh units
	(Lord's army)

Ward save: 4% for War Wagon, Steam Tank and Luminark of Hysh units
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +5% for War Wagon, Steam Tank and Luminark of Hysh units
	(Lord's army)

Ward save: 8% for War Wagon, Steam Tank and Luminark of Hysh units
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +10% for War Wagon, Steam Tank and Luminark of Hysh units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Imperial Gunnery
skillTree.description: Despite what the Dwarfs think, no other race can bring to bear such devastating artillery volleys.

effects.description:
Missile strength: +3% for Mortar, Great Cannon, Helblaster Voley Gun and Helstorm Rocket Battery units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +10% for Mortar, Great Cannon, Helblaster Voley Gun, and Helstorm Rocket Battery units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +5% for Mortar, Great Cannon, Helblaster Voley Gun and Helstorm Rocket Battery units
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +10% for Mortar, Great Cannon, Helblaster Voley Gun and Helstorm Rocket Battery units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Strength of Hardship
skillTree.description: The frontline will either make or break you. Those who survive become the backbone of any army.

effects.description:
Leadership: +5 for Spearmen, Swordsmen, Flagellants, Sigmarite Disciples, Huntsmen and Empire Knights units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +5 for Spearmen, Swordsmen, Flagellants, Sigmarite Disciples, Huntsmen and Empire Knights units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Magic resistance: 15% for Spearmen, Swordsmen, Flagellants, Sigmarite Disciples, Huntsmen and Empire Knights units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Sharpshooter
skillTree.description: The veteran marksman knows the precise range required to land the killing shot.

effects.description:
Missile resistance: 15% for Free Company Militia, Crossbowmen, Huntsmen, Archers, Handgunners, Pistoliers and Outriders units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +10% for Free Company Militia, Crossbowmen, Huntsmen, Archers, Handgunners, Pistoliers and Outriders units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +10% for Free Company Militia, Crossbowmen, Huntsmen, Archers, Handgunners, Pistoliers and Outriders units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Taste for Battle
skillTree.description: Some men grow to relish war, dulled to the pain and living solely for the thrill of the kill.

effects.description:
Physical resistance: 10% for Greatswords, Wolf-Kin, Halberdiers, Order Knights and Demigryph units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +5 for Greatswords, Wolf-Kin, Halberdiers, Order Knights and Demigryph units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +5 for Greatswords, Wolf-Kin, Halberdiers, Order Knights and Demigryph units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Artillery Master
skillTree.description: Those in command of ordnance can potentially decide a battle before the melee has even begun.

effects.description:
Missile strength: +10% for Mortar, Great Cannon, Helblaster Volley Gun, Helstorm Rocket Battery, War Wagon, Luminark of Hysh and Steam Tank units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +10% for Mortar, Great Cannon, Helblaster Volley Gun, Helstorm Rocket Battery, War Wagon, Luminark of Hysh and Steam Tank units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +20% for Mortar, Great Cannon, Helblaster Volley Gun, Helstorm Rocket Battery, War Wagon, Luminark of Hysh and Steam Tank units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Route Marcher
skillTree.description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

skillTree.name: Iron Disciplinarian
skillTree.description: This Lord expects utter obedience from the smallfolk, and has little time for insurrections or petty revolts.

skillTree.name: Leader of Renown
skillTree.description: Revered by the Warrior Priests, such a celebrated leader will inspire many new recruits.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +25
	(Lord's army)

Recruitment cost: -5% for all units
	(Lord's army)

Unit experience gain per turn: +50
	(Lord's army)

Recruitment cost: -10% for all units
	(Lord's army)

Unit experience gain per turn: +100
	(Lord's army)

Recruitment cost: -20% for all units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Reassuring Presence
skillTree.description: The presence of this Lord ensures a measure of calm, reducing panic and desertion amongst followers.

effects.description:
Attrition: -3% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -8% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -15% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Fervent
skillTree.description: Through our acts, the gods will cleanse the lands.

skillTree.name: Irrepressible
skillTree.description: It is said that Sigmar would bear a mortal wound and carry on fighting; this champion follows the hallowed Warrior-God.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +30% for Lords
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.name: Quartermaster
skillTree.description: A good quartermaster can ration equipment and foodstuffs efficiently, making supplies last longer.

skillTree.name: Logistician
skillTree.description: Proficient with figures, this Lord, or his subordinates, can keep his army fulfilled, even in dire circumstances.

skillTree.name: Alert
skillTree.description: Countless conflicts and a keen sense of awareness have made this Lord difficult to entrap.

effects.description: Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +5%
Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +10%

skillTree.name: Headhunter
skillTree.description: "Ever thought about joining the Elector's troops, chief? You'd make a good soldier alright."

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +10% chance of wounding aggressors

Recruit rank: +1 for all units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Maintenance
skillTree.description: FACTIONWIDE: all source of income: -0,5% and characters upkeep: +1%. Effects are additive. Negated on level 30 of character.

backgroundSkills.name: Emperor
backgroundSkills.description: "Our names will be remembered in our people's songs until the end of time!"

effects.description:
Public order: -100% penalty due to presence or lack of corruption
	(local province)

Recruitment cost: -25% for all units
	(Lord's army)
